com.metreeca.rest.handlers

Class Creator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Delegator
      • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Actor
        • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Creator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public final class Creator
extends Actor
    Model-driven resource creator.

    Performs:

    • role-based request shape redaction and shape-based authorization, considering shapes enabled by the Shape.Create task and the Shape.Detail area;
    • engine-assisted request payload validation;
    • resource slug generation;
    • engine assisted resource creation.

    All operations are executed inside a single engine transaction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Creator

        public Creator()
        Creates a resource creator with a UUID-based slug generator.

      • Creator

        public Creator(Function<Request,String> slug)
        Creates a resource creator.
        Parameters:
        slug - a function mapping from the creation request to the identifier to be assigned to the newly created resource; must return a non-null non-clashing value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if slug is null

      • Creator

        public Creator(Format<T> format,
               BiFunction<Request,T,String> slug)
        Creates a resource creator.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the message body to be inspected during slug generation
        Parameters:
        format - the format of the message body to be inspected during slug generation
        slug - a function mapping from the creation request and its payload to the identifier to be assigned to the newly created resource; must return a non-null non-clashing value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either format or slug is null
